website_summaries.verdict: For parents who don't want to spend a lot of money and need a versatile table.
pros: Play table has a LEGO compatible peg top
Comes at a height that can be used with 2 included chairs
Top can be removed and hold water for a water table or flipped for a flat all-purpose top
cons: The quality on the construction of this plastic table is not as high as some others on the market
Cover can be hard to remove

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for my 2 1/2 years old
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea that she can use the table for drawing, coloring, playing lego and she can store her stuff in the storage table.. My only suggestion is put a string so its not to hard to open the top to get her stuff... happy for my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Armie del Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this table. As other reviewers said the chairs are very lightweight however my 21 mos GS loves to lift both at the same time because he is so strong! My GS had a ball using the table yesterday with snow in it. :) HOWEVER 2 issues with the table..1) the top fits VERY snugly so I have to use a butter knife to pry it out. 2) the plug to convert the table to a water table (it has a hole for water drainage and to house the center support for the table top) does not fit at all. I will have to find another plug.
customer_reviews.author: mamama

customer_reviews.title: but fine for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for. Other reviewers are correct that it's tricky to flip the surface, but it's manageable. Also, the chairs are flimsy, but fine for our purposes. I also like that this can be easily taken apart if we need some extra space. I was also pleased that the block table top works with the blocks that came with it, the set of Mega Bloks he already has and the legos he'll eventually be big enough to use. The blocks that came with it are probably fine for an older kid, but our 18-month old finds it harder to pull them apart than the Mega Bloks he's used to.
customer_reviews.author: NCabakirk

customer_reviews.title: The problem has been fixed
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, as does my granddaughter, seen in the picture. It is sturdy, completely washable, doesn't mark wood floors, easy to move to the porch for water play, etc, etc. The one problem noted in past reviews was the problem removing the top from the table, which has been fixed by making indents in the table to fit a finger under the lid. There is an indent on each side. You can see this in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can very occasionally get The chairs are a great height for my 36" tall 2 year old to ...
customer_reviews.text: The top of the table is extremely difficult to get off if you want to use if for storage for blocks. I have to turn it on its side to get it open. To remedy this I taped some ribbon to the bottom of the insert to give a tab to pull up. Also it DOES NOT work with well with megabloks. I can very occasionally get The chairs are a great height for my 36" tall 2 year old to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a table, not so much for Duplo bricks
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these tables. I bought one for each of my 3 year old twins. We use them all the time to do crafts, coloring, play dough, puzzles, snack time, and much more. We do occasionally use the other side for their duplo legos (which is why I bought the tables) but they have a hard time getting them to snap in. (they do snap in, it’s just a struggle) However it worked out, as they have enjoyed using them as a desk.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are fine for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Everyone’s complaints seem to be about the chairs, but I didn’t have a problem with them. I imagine their kids are older than mine. I have a 19mo-old, and he sits in these on his on just fine. But they’re also lightweight, so he can move them around as he wishes. This table is cute, but the table top is quite difficult to remove. There is no handle or hole or anything to grasp onto. You need to use the force from your fingers to lift it up - and god forbid they’re oily, you’re never getting that lid off. Other than that, the table is great. Perfect size, and my son loves to eat lunch at it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Good price, fun
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good for the price. Fairly sturdy. The little one likes it and has taken to it quickly. Colorful and fun. The only concern I have is that the legs of the table and chairs should have some sort of slide resistant patches on the bottom. We have hardwood floors in the family room so we had to put down his play mat under the table and chairs because they were sliding out from under him when he moved.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 year olds
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is 2 years old. He tends to be very active and distructive sometimes. But this table has hold up preatty well with him. Its exacly how you see. Asembly is preatty easy, I did it under half an hour. It fits well in any corner of the house and is not to noticible around the house. The lego that come with it are not as big as the Blocko bricks but are a decent size. Overall is a great buy. It helps him not paint my floors with crayons, so I say that's a win.
customer_reviews.author: Colon Siblings

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it but it arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Update: table was delivered 5/20 broken and yet to get a response from seller on a replacement chair as of 7/17/2020 My son loves his new table. It is a perfect size for a 19 month old. Unfortunately the green chair arrived cracked yesterday so I’m waiting on a response from the vendor if I have to exchange the whole kit or if I can just swap the chair. Three stars on the sturdiness/durability of the chairs. The chair tips over when he tries to get in it because it isn’t very heavy. No issues with the blocks sticking to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Most of the  blocks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it as a table for LEGO blocks. The description says: compatible with most of the blocks. BUT ours is only compatible with the small square blocks. Everything that is wider or longer doesn’t work with it. The seller suggested to return the table and he would make a refund but I got rid of the box and everything unnecessary after unpacking the table. I couldn’t even imagine that I would face any problem with it. So I just don’t want to go through the hassle with buying a new box and packing the table, taking it to ups store... considering that it’s not really a LEGO table the price is high.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table for our Lego loving 2 year old and while the table is a great size for her the Lego part of the table has been a disappointment. We have a mix of Duplo blocks and Mega Blocks and neither of them connect well to the table. It is very hard to get them to click to the table and even when you do get them connected they will eventually pop off. The chairs are sturdy and even me and my husband can sit on them but make sure that they are on carpet or a rug otherwise they will slide out from underneath whoever is sitting on them.
customer_reviews.author: DaveandMickayla

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to giving this to my son for Christmas. However once it came and I assembled it, it was clear how cheaply it was made. It only came in some plastic bags and just made together with plastic. I think if it sold for $20 it would be worth it and a good deal, but I bought it for close to $60 and for that money I expected better. I sent it back, and I plan to make my own lego table now.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Milton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not worth your time. Keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: This set is very cheap and difficult to turn the tabletop over, I have to use a butterknife to pop the table out of position so that I can turn it over and I think I cracked the tabletop while doing this. Also my twin 2 year olds, one is a little bigger and one is a little smaller, both have had the chairs slide out from under them or the chair falls over when they lean back and they both have fallen on the floor. This table and chairs is not safe for my children and so I'm returning it after just 3 days, but several falls on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to assemble but legos hard to use
customer_reviews.text: So the table and chairs are super cute and seriously easy to put together. The problem is with the blocks..first of all it only comes with a handful and second they don’t really fit well on the table itself...I bought this for my two year old and I just don’t see that it would be easy for him to snap them in to place yet as you need a bit of force to get them to stay. Otherwise as I said it’s very cute and will serve the other purpose just fine. Just a little disappointed on the LEGO front.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how this table got so many reviews. I make choices often based on the public reviews. This table is so flimsy. The table top (flat drawing side) was completely scratched up (total mess). My grandson started to press the legos down onto the lego top, and guess what?? Yep, crack. We went to pick up the chair and the back came off and it was put in all the way. This should have been more like $29, not $69. Very unsatisfied with this purchase. Very unhappy camper on this purchase. I only write reviews if i’m Very happy with a purchase, or very unsatisfied, and this one sure missed the boat.
customer_reviews.author: DJS-MA

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT COMPATIABLE WITH DUPLO LEGOS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his Birthday to have at my house and my sister ordered him one to keep at his home and since he has a lot of DUPLO Legos. However I was Very Disappointed that his DUPLO Legos does not snap onto this table. The description said that it was compatible and it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and creative design!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 22-month old grandson, to be kept at my house for his visits here. He loved it! He sat right down and started playing with the duplos which I left attached when I flipped the top over to the smooth surface for him to do some coloring on. It was put together in 5 minutes and it's the perfect size! Can't wait to put it on the deck so he can use the water table. Very creative design!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Guglielmo

customer_reviews.title: Useful table chair set, light weight to carry around but be careful with kiddos sit and slip through
customer_reviews.text: My toddler son loves this cute table set sooo much! He especially loves the storage place so that he can put many books and block toys inside as he wants. He also loves those two light weight chairs, he moves them around the house and use it as a stool, haha, yeah he’s that smart. The only safety concern that I have, as a mom, is that because this set is so light weight, I’m concerned that he’d fall down sometimes when he sits or stands on it. Otherwise it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: For drawing, legos and other sit-down activities for kids, it’s an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great little table. It’s a little shirt for my 6 year old but just right for my 4 year old. The storage capacity could stand to be a little deeper, but we’re trying to store already built legos in it. If we were storing disassembled bricks, it would fit allot. The chairs and table were super easy to assemble, no tools needed. It’s an excellent activity table too. We like using it to let the kids eat at a table their own size. The kids think it’s awesome, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: Creative idea but...
customer_reviews.text: This was the first thing my 2 1/2 year old granddaughter headed for when she walked in the door today. I had it set up with textured surface so she could play with the blocks. However, I was disappointed at how light-weight and tippy the chairs are. The tables and chairs were not too hard to assemble. I just wish the legs of the chairs were open ended where they screw into the seat so I could put in some stones or sand or anything to make them more stable. The chairs are also quite small. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jafo

customer_reviews.title: Great table - terrible chairs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to go with some vintage sesame street chairs. The table matches and looks very cute with my chairs. The chairs that came with the table are very flimsy and tip easily. I will not be giving them to my grandson. I will also not be taking them to good will. I don't want to think of some child falling off of them. I'd like to send them back to the company for a partial refund and a redesign. The table is great if you just need a table. But I do wish the finger hole to turn the table top was bigger. It's hard to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly DeVault

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this table! It's not quite as sturdy as I had hoped, but it should hold up alright as long as the kids aren't too rough with it. I was surprised to see the lego side had the small lego style pegs rather than the large duplo lego pegs. We don't have any small legos yet to try on it but the large duplo legos do fit on it, just not perfectly. Overall, worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: micro

customer_reviews.title: Table and Chairs Are Quite Flimsy--Priced Too High
customer_reviews.text: The features--table on one side and Lego base on the other--seemed very attractive. The price is quite high for an all-plastic set, but I thought this meant high-quality . Ordered it for my 2-year old grand-daughter as a Christmas gift. I am quite disappointed. The table and chairs are flimsy, the table top does not fit snugly into the frame, and overall has a "cheap" look. Also, the Lego side surface does not fit well with genuine LEGO blocks. Hard for a child to snap the pieces in and equally difficult to pull them out. I will keep it because there was no blatantly false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer from Sugar Land, Texas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The jumbo blocks don't click easily on to the block surface, but it can work. Good size for my 2.5 year old, some kid furniture is too big for that age. Not super sturdy, but fairly good. The versatility makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Great Versatile Table
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this table. We use it almost everyday. The lego side gets used periodically but on the flip side we use the table for arts and crafts, playdoh time, or sometimes to even eat. Inside the table, we use it for kinetic sand, water splashing or some moto skills building activities. Great investment for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nesto

customer_reviews.title: It's just fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it fits different brands of blocks on the textured surface. We are not talking top of the line here. It is plastic and it's not as big and sturdy as the wood based ones you'll find at the dentist office or kids store play area (those cost 300.00+) but it works for our 2 yr old and doesnt take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Mayzee

customer_reviews.title: Legos and related blocks don't stay in position, bounce off.
customer_reviews.text: The Lego blocks that came with the table (25) aokg with other brand name blocks that we have do not work well with the table.... They bounce off once pushed into place properly. They sometimes bounce away by themselves or when other pieces are placed next to them. It's frustrating because you can't actually build anything without the pieces jumping off of the table.... Would not recommend for this reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Dirka Dirka

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: This table is ok, but it is a little smaller than I expected which in all fairness I should have looked more closely at the specs. I have my doubts about the sturdiness. I don't think it would take much to break it. I wish I'd ordered something made of wood instead of plastic. We'll see if it stands up against my 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeleber

customer_reviews.title: SO cheap
customer_reviews.text: I mean, what was I expecting for $32? It's a lot smaller than I thought. The Lego board does not work well- blocks pop off left and right. It's best used as a water table and for play dough. Super easy to cart outside for the former. Make sure your kids don't put any weight on this table though. It is SO light that if they lean against it, it will slide and they will face plant. So, maybe not the best idea for a cruising infant unless you're RIGHT THERE holding a leg. My cruiser LOVES the water table feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice table though very light chairs easy to topple
customer_reviews.text: The table is a great size for my 15 month old son and he enjoyed playing with blocks on table. I think he'll have fun filling it with water and playing with toys inside. Some cons: I find it difficult to pick up the table top to turn it over. My qualm with the chairs is that they are so light and unstable, it's very easy for the chair to topple over as my son is trying to sit on them. He already had one such accident falling over when trying to climb up on it. Probably better product then for older children.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Schinasi

customer_reviews.title: We like it alot.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. But...not all the legos stick to it. I believe Lego makes the bottom of the really big pieces different on purpose/for this very reason, so that imitation Lego brands will have a hard time. Definitely, I do not regret my purchase. This is a cool table and we can set up all our Lego sets (all at the same time) on this table. However, there are four different colored sections and a couple could use a fresh dose of super glue to stay down better. This does not effect anyfun unless u want to place 1 block on 2 colors at the same time, which is not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Horbowski

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for Legos
customer_reviews.text: This table is great to store and play with legos. Small enough and light enough to put in corner and pull it out when child wants to play with it.It isn't the sturdiest table one can buy but for the money this table is wonderful.The lego board on the top of table is great.
customer_reviews.author: RuLean S Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all Duolo and regular Legos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for grandson who is 2 and infatuated with his Duplo blocks. We got this so he could have a way to store and play with them. He loves it. It holds over 200 Duplo blocks and he is able to remove the top himself. As far as the sturdiness of this table he is a typical boy and I've caught him climbing on it with no broken parts. Great table
customer_reviews.author: brownd379

customer_reviews.title: Not as large or big as I would have liked!
customer_reviews.text: Again here's a product I should not have relied on the image. I should have focused on the measurements, only if I looked. SMH. Great for a toddler alone. Not meant to seat 2 toddlers. Especially if they are eating at the table. Okay for play with 2 but not for eating. Lack of surface space.
customer_reviews.author: cocoty

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids really enjoy this. It makes it easier to play with their legos. The only complaint I have is the top is a little hard to get out once you put it in place because it fits well. You can use the flat top for them to eat on so it is multiple use. I have not tried to the water option. Also the flat top can be used for puzzles. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh- pricey for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Like: The table was easy to assemble. The inside storage is spacious and the table top has been easy to flip so far. Dislike: The chair legs did give me a hard time securing and feel rather flimsy. I feel it is extremely overpriced and wouldn’t want to pay more than $40 for this. My last $30 table was actually better quality :/
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This item is complete junk not only do the duplos have a problem connecting you cannot use any of the large platforms that came with your duplos sets. The table is also very flimsy and cheap. I would not buy something like this for more than $10.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Great but small
customer_reviews.text: It's a great table and holds all the legos which is nice. Only complaint is it's a little smaller than I thought. I thought the chairs would be a little bigger. My 4yo cant sit at the table comfortably. But he can stand and play, so still happy with the purchase over all.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani McGuire

customer_reviews.title: This table is perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for what I wanted. The price was a little steep for my liking as it's just a plastic table. But my girls love it. It's better in carpet because it is lightweight and easily moved on other floorings. I wish the bottom of the legs on both the table and chairs were weighted and had rubber on them so they wouldn't move so much. I think that would be a great addition. (:
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This table is great because you can use one side to play legos and the other side can be used for drawing or even eating on. Very easy to assemble and the chairs even hold my husband or myself without issue. We have taken this table outside, plugged the hole in the middle and used it as a water table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table and chairs slip on hard floors
customer_reviews.text: My toddler will sit and draw or eat at her new table, but both the chairs are very light and table and chairs slip constantly on our hardwood floors- we have to help scoot her chair to the table or table to the chair constantly and also have to hold the chair down for her to sit so it doesn’t slide from underneath her. We will either use this outdoors only or will need to buy a nonslip later for underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Newton

customer_reviews.title: The kids feel special!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my grandchildren who are almost 2 yrs old. They love it! I was looking for a way to have a place they know they can play at and not have to spread out all over the place when it comes to blocks and coloring. Storage is helpful. Came with just enough blocks for this age group. Seems sturdy. Haven’t done water play yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley L Waiau

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars no doubt
customer_reviews.text: I was missing one leg and Amazon wanted me to return set for refund, but my grandchildren threw a fit because they liked it so much I purchased from a hardware store a pvc pipe to replace missing leg and they are super happy 😊. Some times it's not worth it to return a purchase even if something is missing. Product is a 5 star 🌟 purchase 😃
customer_reviews.author: William Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2.5 year old son and he loves it! Plus the customer service is absolutely amazing. Mine was missing the water plug and they sent one to me first class immediately. The ppl I talked to at the company were so kind and understanding and worked efficiently cuz I didn’t wanna return the table just wanted a small missing part! I would buy again just to support these ppl tbh. Great experience and the table is cute
customer_reviews.author: Carla L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great size for 3 year olds. Haven't put water in, yet...so I hope it will hold water. Unfortunately, the Lego table is useless for building Legos. They pop off immediately after putting them on! That's why 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: R. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4byear old number. She LOVES it! She's able to flip the table top on her own (whether she wants to play with building blocks, or using the flat surface to draw & color or eat a meal). I'm even able to store some of her smaller toys inside.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: We have not yet opened the box, as it's a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. But I want to say this: The product was shipped very swiftly, in a very sturdy box. We were amazed it arrived so fast after ordering. Let me also add, I looked at a lot of table/chair sets for my granddaughter, and this one just blew the others away. Color, versatility and price. We can't wait for her to be open it on Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: denimsquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and how sturdy it is. I’m 5’1” and 130 lbs and I can sit on the little chairs. You can have a smooth side or one where the kids can play (large) legos and under the cover it has storage container about 5” deep. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cin D

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy construction
customer_reviews.text: Ordering this table based on a photo and glowing description was a mistake. The plastic composition of the table was very thin, and I could tell as soon as I pulled the chair pieces out of the box that they would be dangerous of a small child to sit on, because they were so flimsy and easy to tip over. I sent it back before even trying it out..
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Light weighted , i expected more
customer_reviews.text: Well lets say i was so excited to receive this table, from the great reviews that ive read, but i was not that happy, its very light weighted, my daughter started climbing and standing on the top of it and she started dragging it all over the house, and the lego board is hard , you need to make an effort to put the legos in, as for the chairs they are not sturdy and she keeps dragging them all over as well, i expected much more, i bought it like a month ago, and am keeping it, because my daughter loves it and consider it a toy and not a table😂
customer_reviews.author: Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Table
customer_reviews.text: This table and chair set is great! We recently bought it for my 3 year old’s birthday and it was super easy to put together. It fits nicely in his room where he uses it for puzzles, drawing, but mostly for playing LEGOs. I especially love that it has so much storage space, the other activity tables that I looked at didn’t have as much space, this table makes it easier to keep track of all the LEGOs.
customer_reviews.author: AMK28

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great fun table for the kids. Easy assembly and the size is good. The table is a little warped, so writing on the flat side is a little off for 2. But is is great on the lego side. Storage is a huge bonus
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It says what it is
customer_reviews.text: We realised that we needed a table for our toddler to play with as our dining table was getting a bit too marked up for my liking, I liked that the table had multiple ways to use it and you can do just that. I had read other reviews that the chairs were unsteady, which is true, so the chairs are only out when my toddler can be supervised. But the table seems quite sturdy. Yesterday I walked into her room and my little one had crawled onto the table (it was set up for the water setting) and was reading her book. I was impressed it was sturdy to hold her.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Great for building
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt really recommend for ages of 4 and up. It is small but it does work. I do like it very much. The legos are a little hard to put on there, but nothing crazy. It's a good multiuse table!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome. Our duplo LEGO’s fit great, the smooth side of the table is great to go with the play kitchen- cutting vegetables , and we used the water table for a sand table. We bought the motion sand ( 4 boxes ) and toys and it works perfect holding the sand, and my little one has a ball playing with it. Fast delivery, and very well built table and chairs. I am 100% happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Because the chairs are so light weight, sitting down ...
customer_reviews.text: Because the chairs are so light weight, sitting down on them without falling is virtually impossible. Every time my 2 1/2 year old tried seating down, the chair would slide off from behind him and he fell on his tooshy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: The best activity table ever! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best toddler/young child table I’ve ever seen. It’s the 3rd table set we’ve tried for our toddler & by far the best. So versatile & sturdy. The LEGO building table that can be flipped to become a normal art/eating table is genius. We love it. If you have a little person...buy this. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Austinite

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table work great with my toddler. In the summer months we used the water table and my child loved it. Chairs are very sturdy too that my wife sits on them while playing across from our child
customer_reviews.author: Serious Jest

customer_reviews.title: Not so impressive
customer_reviews.text: It’s way too small and not like what it shows on Amazon in terms of real size ( on the picture). Easy to install for less than 2 minutes but probably not a long-term table for growing toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: antipas

customer_reviews.title: it's good but it doesn't weigh enough
customer_reviews.text: It is good but it does not weigh enough to stay in one place if the children move it and the chairs hold a lot of weight but when the children lean forward a little, the chair turns and the children fall
customer_reviews.author: Yisset Lantigua

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy. My 2 year old climbs in it when filling it with water to play. I’m 5’2 130 lbs and have sat in the chair with her at the table and they haven’t broken yet lol. She’s uses this table all the time. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Okay Table set
customer_reviews.text: Although my 21months old likes the table and chair it is not sturdy. The chair and table is flimsy. The table set wobbles. My son keeps falling trying to sit on he chair. Wish I would have invested more money and bought a wooden table and chair set.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Easy for kids to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and how easily my 7yo and 4yo can maneuver flipping the top with out my help..busy mom of 4 and the last thing I wanted was another chore!
customer_reviews.author: Tidbit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Good quality but chair isn't sturdy for 1 yr old
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because my kids love it and it and it finally got them to draw more but the chairs are so lightweight that my 1 year old sometimes falls off of it lol but it's perfect for the 3 and 7 year old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I pictured. It’s perfect. It is a little hard to attach the really long flat legos and the duplo but other than that it’s perfect for my little builder.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors and versatility. Haven't used water in it yet. Kids are perfectly content with using it as a desk to color and play on. One major downside is the sturdiness of it. Love that its light weight for ease of transport, however when my kids are trying to push the legos in to connect, if cause the legos on the other side to pop out. My daughter (6 yrs) quite building legos on the Lego side and just used the smooth side due to frustration
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Salva

customer_reviews.title: So cute and useful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table to our 18months baby and he loves it. It has a lego side and a normal side and it is very easy to assemble and store. You can also fill it with water and my son loves that!
customer_reviews.author: selma

customer_reviews.title: The best of all worlds: water table, Lego table and crafts
customer_reviews.text: I love this table so much. I used it as a water table with the plug and it worked perfectly. Most of the time I have it as a regular table but I like having the option to let her play with the blocks on the Lego side or use it for a sensory bin/water table.
customer_reviews.author: Nate & Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Love the 3 options
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 year old grandson to use at our house. He absolutely loves the table, the legos side and he uses the smooth side for his train set. The storage is great for his trains and legos. We have not used the storage for water play yet. The chairs are sturdy. I sat in one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lego 3 in 1 table
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn't as sturdy as I would have hoped and the legos do not stay attached to the table (which is the main reason I bought the table, so they could create a foundation on which to build) when my grandkids are playing on it. We have several different sized of Legos but, unfortunately, none of them really work on the table.
customer_reviews.author: jlizp10

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Received what was described from seller. My 5 yr old loves his new table! He put it together by himself so, easy assembly. It's his homework desk, snack table, lego table all in one. I saw reviews that it was hard to open the top and people were using a ribbon to pop it out but our table has holes on two sides. This makes it easy for you to put your fingers through it and pop it right up. My Son has no problem opening it. 4 stars because the lego base plates are hard to put on the table top and the instructions do not indicate where to put one of the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our 2.5 year old grandson and he loves it. It was easy to assemble and seems very sturdy. He plays with it daily and refers to it as his special table. This is also his first experience with Legos and they are a big hit. The storage in the table is also nice to keep crayons, coloring books and Legos in.
customer_reviews.author: ESWR

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I have my grandsons. The Legos are to small for them right now so I put them away and put the larger ones in it. So they can play there and I can flip the table top and they can eat there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect 1st table for your little one.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 year old, he really loved it then and loves it now over a year later. We bought water toys for it and he used it to color and eat snacks on. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The lego top is useless and nearly impossible to get a piece to stick to it. The chairs are durable though and can support an adult if needed. Not a ton of room to fit toys in under the lid but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table, my kids do love it. The chair a a little to light weight and the kids knock them over sometimes when trying to sit. My kids are 3 and 2.
customer_reviews.author: Another Guy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i wanted for my son! he loves it, it comes with legos to play with, it does not come with any water accessories though. He plays with it all day and when it's time for him to draw or color you can flip the table upside down and it's flat for writing, or drawing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: functional
customer_reviews.text: Table and chairs are able to break down and set back up which I needed so when grandkids are gone I can slide it under the bed. I never could find an age group on this other than 18 months and up. Works great for 2 year old. Too small for my 5 year old grandson and he is small for his age so I would say age group 18 months to 4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 20 month old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter and she loves it... only downfall is she wants Mom and I to sit in the other chair with her but the chairs are kinda sketchy with adult weight... Mom weighs 130lbs and Dad 185...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but slides around the floor way to easy
customer_reviews.text: Slides to easy on the floor, needs nonskid pads under the chairs and table. But my 2 year old granddaughter likes the table and will get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Them Entertains
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Three Year Old. Great Decision! Keeps Him Idle for at least an hour, the building blocks side gets the most love obviously. Very Easy to assemble. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: UNCLE SOUTH

customer_reviews.title: Maybe maybe not depends on you
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to clean and melted from very little heat exposure not worth the price , more like 21.99 plus tax .Was bought in March and already have ordered a new table , not even a year of use . If price was lowered it would be a acceptable for the price but not at this price quality is poor .Maybe a outside table that you would only clean by spraying down with a hose or pressure washer 😳
customer_reviews.author: Jenell J.

customer_reviews.title: Decent set except for the blocks that don’t stick well
customer_reviews.text: Table is decent and sturdy. Only thing we don’t like is the duplex blocks don’t stick and have to be pushed very hard. My 2 year old gets irritated with that. Surprisingly the duplex blocks provided with the table set have the same problem. This may not be a problem for older children who have the strength to push it hard and let it stick. Overall it works.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Perfect size for my 3 yr old boy. He loves his new table set where he can eat and play LEGO’s or watch tv while sitting on his new throne. We are inLove!
customer_reviews.author: Naoj

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and comfortable for our 18 month old granddaughter. She was thrilled to see her new play table ready for fun at gramma’s house. The legs come off for easy storage after our visits.
customer_reviews.author: rellots

customer_reviews.title: Love it in the Transition
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson went from a portable high chair on the counter to sitting on this. No high chair needed. He loves the water too so in the summer we put it on the patio and fill it with about 2 inches of water. He actually played in it for an hour....he eats on it when we have him for the day...love it.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra M.

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose table for 2 to 5 yr olds
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to our 2 yr old gr8grandson. He loves it can manage changing the table tops himself. Loves to build with the bocks on the LEGO surface. Uses the storage area for his blocks and little cars. He gets a lot of use out of it
customer_reviews.author: Manya X6

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old. I would say in comparison to how big he is the ratio is perfect for his size. It was super easy to put together and it's sturdy. I have wood floors so it slides on them, but I put down a new rug and it stays in place. Versatile legos or building blocks work with the building block side. And it's super easy to just flip the table top over for the regular table side. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 13 month old so he could stand and play. And that is exactly what this provides. The lego block table was a bonus and he loves playing with that side the most! Super light to move around, easy to change styles, and doubles as toy storage. This has become the most played with toy in my house. Only thing is since it’s light if my son leans too much it will slide, but I just put it in a corner or against other furniture. Anyways, we really do love this table and we are thinking about getting one for Grandmas house.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dyer

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I’ve purchased!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to give it sometime to write a review on this product because I wanted to see if the standards were there and let me tell you that they actually are. Right from the delivery, to building and storage. It’s just perfect and my little one loves it. It’s perfect for her size and age and she both side of the table. We go from coloring, playing with play dough, to eating lunch and the switching it and playing with LEGO’s. It’s just perfect!!! I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Odd design
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are flimsy and the design is odd. Storage is underneath the table and you have to lift the table top every time you need a lego.
customer_reviews.author: elmo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old daughter and it's the perfect size! She needed something that was hers to eat snack at and color or paint. She's into the legos and the storage compartment also. It's a strong plastic, but not for a kiddo that is a natural climber. The table is probably not sturdy enough to stand on. Can't wait to try the water table out when the weather is warm. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is two and absolutely loves this. It is perfect for her size. We have mega blocks and they need to be pressed down on the lego top, but do work with the table. We have filled the inside of the table with rice and a friend of mine filled it with sand to provide a different type of activity if you are using this inside and don't want to fill it with water. We put it together in a snap and feel like the money spent was worth it =).
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This table was wonderful for my four-year-old daughter her birthday was in December. She absolutely loves it we use it as a Lego table inside. You did not need any tools to assemble this table. It literally just snaps together.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Marie leese

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: My friend bought almost the same one from ALDI for aprox 20 dollars. Plus there were in addition educational painting on their convertible tabletop. Was upset for spending more money and could not be able to return, because the return office is very very far from my place.
customer_reviews.author: Nasib

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son fell in love with it as soon as I put it together which was extremely easy. Chairs feel really sturdy nice that it came with two. Now the first thing he does in the morning is play on the table building legos. Gives me time to actually drink my coffee :) best buy ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amiya

customer_reviews.title: Great play table!
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old son loves this table and chairs. The table and chairs are very sturdy. We have these on an outdoor deck so the fact that they're plastic and weather resistant is a plus. Also, they fit very nicely into his playhouse when he's not using them. We're very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Wasik

customer_reviews.title: Product works well
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors that attract the kids. Table and chairs are sturdy, chairs are light for easy moving around. The Brick surface can hold bricks tightly but because the dots are shallow, the bricks get displaced easily when knocked lightly by other toys like cars etc. Also the centre of the table surface dents downwards when pressed while playing with toy cars. My boy loves cars and can be on the more clumsy side when he gets carried away.
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: It is a big hit with my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Not only was it easy to assemble, I took it apart and had my nearly 5 year old grandson assemble it. Not only that, but his dad is very slender and tall and can still sit on the chair and they take his weight easily.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy bookworm

product_meta.title: Play Platoon Kids Activity Table Set - 5 in 1 Water Table, Building Block Table, Craft Table and Sensory Table with Storage - Includes 2 Chairs and 25 Ex-Large Blocks – Primary Colors
feature_bullets: 5 IN 1 TABLE will entertain kids for hours as a water table, building block table, drawing and crafts table, sensory (sand, rice, slime) table, and storage unit. Inspires imaginative play as your kids splash, build, and create!
INCLUDES 2 CHAIRS & 25 EX-LARGE BLOCKS for instant fun. Compatible and guaranteed tight fit with all major building block sets.
BUILT TO LAST - This kids activity table set is strong, durable, and easy to switch from building block side, to smooth side, to water table.
CONVENIENT STORAGE - Interior provides convenient storage for building blocks, craft supplies, water toys and more.
GREAT GIFT for boys and girls ages 18 months and up. Inspires creativity and grows with the child. 20" x 20" x 17" table. Chairs are 18" high and the seat is 10" off the floor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,105 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
